page.name: MHS Girls Four Girls
page.description: Girls 4 Girls provides girls a safe space to come together, share stories, discuss important topics, get advice, & make friends who empower each other to be more confident. We believe that girls need girls. Sometimes, we just need a chance to get together and talk about the things that matter, including friendships, relationships, pressures, expectations, confidence, overcoming fears, and so much more. Our goal is to unite girls in their schools and worldwide, inspire authentic confidence, and support one another to be kinder to ourselves and each other.
